channel.title: Server Wont Launch
channel.description:
Okay it seem slike im having a problem over here :S
I have downloaded EasyRSC,when I compile the files both in the server and client they work well...Even the client starts up all good but i cant seem to open the server up :S
I know for sure I have JDK both 1.6.0_30 and 1.7.0_04 and the enviromental variables set properly since other RS2 PS works all good for me, But when I used the 1.7v i got an error of difference in versions or whatever so i reverted to 1.6v, Also Ant is all set inside the folder
here are the pictures:
this is the compiler in the server folder [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RQcVX.png[/img]
and this is the run server bat "not the full log" [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D8VBF.png[/img]
Also these are what's inside the bat files, if this would help:
Compiler: @echo off taskkill /F /IM java.exe set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_30 ant pause
Server: @echo off TITLE EasyRSC set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin ant runserver exit
Help please :D tyvm! And yes im totally new in this...no flaming please <3

item.title: Server Wont Launch
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Try removing it and using JDK6u29, download from oracle website and also don’t forget to update your environmental variables if you use them and just use ‘ant’ compile/runclient

Read full topic

Looks like you have JDK7

item.title: Server Wont Launch
item.dc:creator: @c00ldodo c00ldodo
item.description:
@c00ldodo wrote:

Okay it seem slike im having a problem over here :S

I have downloaded EasyRSC,when I compile the files both in the server and client they work well…Even the client starts up all good but i cant seem to open the server up :S

I know for sure I have JDK both 1.6.0_30 and 1.7.0_04 and the enviromental variables set properly since other RS2 PS works all good for me, But when I used the 1.7v i got an error of difference in versions or whatever so i reverted to 1.6v, Also Ant is all set inside the folder

here are the pictures:

this is the compiler in the server folder

and this is the run server bat
“not the full log”

D8VBF.png664×655

Also these are what’s inside the bat files, if this would help:

Compiler:
@echo off
taskkill /F /IM java.exe
set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_30
ant
pause

Server:
@echo off
TITLE EasyRSC
set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin
ant runserver
exit

Help please
tyvm!
And yes im totally new in this…no flaming please <3

Read full topic
